channel.title: CVE Feed for Saleswonder Team -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-32445|2024-06-18T14:38:13.745Z -- saleswonder%20team -- webinarignition
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Saleswonder Team WebinarIgnition.This issue affects WebinarIgnition: from n/a through 3.05.8.

item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Saleswonder Team WebinarIgnition.This issue affects WebinarIgnition: from n/a through 3.05.8.

item.title: CVE-2023-51424|2024-06-04T17:20:36.778Z -- saleswonder%20team -- webinarignition
item.description: Improper Privilege Management vulnerability in Saleswonder Team WebinarIgnition allows Privilege Escalation.This issue affects WebinarIgnition: from n/a through 3.05.0.

item.title: CVE-2023-51422|2023-12-29T12:59:32.098Z -- saleswonder%20team -- webinar%20plugin%3A%20create%20live%2Fevergreen%2Fautomated%2Finstant%20webinars%2C%20stream%20%26%20zoom%20meetings%20%7C%20webinarignition
item.description: Deserialization of Untrusted Data vulnerability in Saleswonder Team Webinar Plugin: Create live/evergreen/automated/instant webinars, stream & Zoom Meetings | WebinarIgnition.This issue affects Webinar Plugin: Create live/evergreen/automated/instant webinars, stream & Zoom Meetings | WebinarIgnition: from n/a through 3.05.0.

item.title: CVE-2023-51423|2023-12-31T17:52:39.655Z -- saleswonder%20team -- webinar%20plugin%3A%20create%20live%2Fevergreen%2Fautomated%2Finstant%20webinars%2C%20stream%20%26%20zoom%20meetings%20%7C%20webinarignition
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Saleswonder Team Webinar Plugin: Create live/evergreen/automated/instant webinars, stream & Zoom Meetings | WebinarIgnition.This issue affects Webinar Plugin: Create live/evergreen/automated/instant webinars, stream & Zoom Meetings | WebinarIgnition: from n/a through 3.05.0.
